title: Caitlyn Jenner laughs at restaurant's "before and after" pictures on bathroom doors, but there's something missing
description:
A Texas restaurant had pictures of Caitlyn Jenner and Bruce Jenner up to identify if the bathroom was a men's room or a women's room. I'll be honest, some of the dumb ways bars label the bathrooms make things more confusing, but this is at least clear which is for men and which is for women. Before she was a reality star, he was an Olympian. It's not everyone's brand of humor, but one notable person thinks it's funny as hell.

title: Court rules hospital can condemn teen with rare disorder to death, even though the teen wants to "try to live"
description:
VOTE IN THE LWC 2024 GOP STRAW POLL! CLICK HERE!

Pay attention, America. When leftists in this country want government-controlled health care, or "single payer" health care, or whatever new term they come up with to hide that it's the government taking over health care, they point to how Europe has single-payer and we want to be like them. They want us to be like the UK's National Health Service.

The NHS. Where they will let you go blind to cut costs, amputate your leg instead of treating you, and take you to court when you have a rare disorder and don't want to die. That latest one is why we're here today.

title: Watch: Joe Biden lies about being at Ground Zero the day after 9/11, doesn't understand how video works
description:
VOTE IN THE LWC 2024 GOP STRAW POLL! CLICK HERE!

On behalf of everyone at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website, I apologize. We spoke too soon. Yesterday, when the White House's excuse for Joe Biden not going to Ground Zero was that "twenty-two years after Pearl Harbor, US Presidents were not still going to visit Hawaii," we erroneously reported that was the worst 9/11 take of the day. We were wrong. Joe Biden had one more in him.

Lying that he was there at Ground Zero on September 12th.

"Ground Zero in New York. I remember standing there the next day. Felt like I was looking through the gates of hell."
